## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8a4c404a67ab59319cbe0468f8814fdb2d770576ff6c1e58b816b178705447f3)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'rca-url-adaptator' @ 2.1.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
